column4: Daylighter--- i am looking for an easy-to-understand guide to allow me to see my Linux share from my Windows(windoze) machines.. do you have any suggestions?
i am not able to get my windoze systems to log in to my linux share
I dont know, I'd love to find a guide like that myself, as I've had problems with the same thing!
-- i have found a lot of stuff to read, but little to be apply to figure out and apply
